name: MagicMaker (2016)
description:
Make your original magics!

SuperThunderBolt/DragonFire/EternalForceBlizzard...
What magic do you make?

Their favorite name is, of course,
[how to fly], [power], [size], [casting time], [speed], [explosion number], [duration], etc.
You can set the various parameters on their own.

And, you can fight world players by your own magic.

ミライノ制作所
http://mirai-no.com

Naoya Kubota(708QBT)
http://protoaccel.com
